partners.name: Partners
partners.title: They Trust Us
partners.subtitle: Our trusted partners who support us in our mission to drive Africa’s digital transformation.

hero.title: African Financial Resources and Optimization
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in building sustainable economic sovereignty in Africa.
hero.description: We develop cutting-edge technological solutions to promote financial inclusion and support the adoption of emerging technologies, serving Africa’s integrated and sustainable development.

company.title: Our Mission
company.description: AFRO Group is a tech company dedicated to financial and educational innovation in Africa. We create solutions that transform how Africans access financial services and education.
company.visionText: To become Africa’s leader in technological innovation by building an inclusive and accessible financial and educational ecosystem.

fined.title: FinEd
fined.subtitle: Financial Literacy
fined.description: FinEd is more than just an app: it’s an intelligent platform that teaches you to master your money while giving you the digital tools to manage your finances every day.

featuresDescription.education: Interactive modules covering the basics of money management, investing, saving, and more.
featuresDescription.tools: Practical tools to track expenses, create budgets, and plan financial goals.
featuresDescription.community: Join a community of learners to share advice, ask questions, and grow together.
featuresDescription.ai: An AI-powered virtual assistant to answer your financial questions and guide your learning.

pricing.title: Our Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits you
pricing.description: Tailored solutions for every profile to master your finances and build your financial future.

free.name: Free
free.objective: Attract, reassure and give a taste

student.name: Student
student.objective: Support young people in financial management

entrepreneur.name: Entrepreneur
entrepreneur.objective: Help young entrepreneurs structure their finances

premium.name: Premium
premium.objective: Support executives and employees in wealth management

b2g.name: B2G Education
b2g.target: Ministries of education/finance, schools and universities
b2g.objective: Are you a company/NGO that wants to support national financial education programs or add financial education to your CSR offering ?

beta.title: BETA Consulting
beta.subtitle: Digital Transformation Consulting
beta.description: BETA Consulting advises and guides companies and institutions in their digital transformation through blockchain, providing advanced expertise in financial, logistics, and administrative sectors.

servicesDescription.implementation: Development of blockchain IT solutions tailored to your needs.
servicesDescription.training: Professional seminars and training for your teams.

beta.footer: Discover how BETA Consulting can transform your business with blockchain expertise.
